title: ‘Let’s not talk about seconds, make it minutes’: Demi Vollering puts penalty drama behind her on Tourmalet
content:
The SD Worx star put minutes into everybody to take the yellow jersey with one stage remaining.

Read the full article at ‘Let’s not talk about seconds, make it minutes’: Demi Vollering puts penalty drama behind her on Tourmalet on Velo.
